sentence.Network_en: Salter held the bag by the corners and shook it upside down.
sentence.Network_cn: 索尔特捏住包的外角，把它倒过来晃了晃。

sentence.Network_en: Tony had an upside-down map of Britain on his wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尼的墙上倒挂了一张英国地图。

sentence.Network_en: The lid, turned upside down, served as a coffee table.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个盖子被翻过来当作咖啡桌。

sentences.sentence: "put your books on top of the desk"

auth_sentence.content: This gives us an upside view on the world.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This gives us an upside view on the world.

auth_sentence.content: There could well be more upside than down side.
auth_sentence.res_content: There could well be more upside than down side.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There could well be more upside than down side.

auth_sentence.content: Take a sturdy crate and turn it upside down.
auth_sentence.res_content: Take a sturdy crate and turn it upside down.

sentences.en: It’s annoying that we can’t travel until Thursday, but the upside is that the fare’s cheaper then.
sentences.cn: 恼人的是我们星期四才能旅行, 但好处是票价会更便宜。

sentences.en: The sloth spends most of its time hanging upside down from the branches.
sentences.cn: 大部分时间里树懒都是倒挂在树枝上。

sentences.en: Even if you plant the seed upside down,the roots will still grow down.
sentences.cn: 即使你把种子倒过来种,根须还是往下长。

sentences.en: The car hit a wall, turned upside down, and ended up in a field.
sentences.cn: 汽车撞到墙上,翻了过来,最后停在一块田里。

sentences.en: The burglars turned the flat upside down.
sentences.cn: 窃贼把这个单元房翻得一片狼藉。

sentences.en: The divorce turned his whole world upside down .
sentences.cn: 离婚把他的一切都搞得颠三倒四。
